original_text: But all the congregation bade stone them with stones. And the glory of the Lord appeared in the tabernacle of the congregation before all the children of Israel.
korean_text: 온 회중이 그들을 돌로 치려 하는데 그 때에 여호와의 영광이 회막에서 이스라엘 모든 자손에게 나타나시니라

sentences.original_text: And the glory of the Lord
appeared in the tabernacle of the congregation
before all the children of Israel
